cohort: ER+/HER2- Metastatic Breast Cancer, 2nd Line, by Regimen (2024–2025)
summary: CDK4/6i + Fulvestrant regimen delivers 35% higher margins than other regimens for ER+/HER2- MBC patients. A 12% increase in utilization could yield $210,000/year.

clinical_impact.description: CDK4/6i regimens provide substantial clinical benefits over monotherapy options.

metrics.description: Superior progression-free survival for CDK4/6i + Fulvestrant

peer_comparison.description: Your practice uses CDK4/6i + Fulvestrant in only 28% of eligible patients, compared to 45% among peers. This represents a $335,000/year margin opportunity.

action_steps.text: Schedule regimen selection training for oncology team
Implement regimen margin dashboard by provider
Create automated alerts for eligible patients
Identify patients eligible for regimen optimization
Update order sets to prioritize higher-margin regimens
Analyze payer mix impact on regimen margins

suggestions.text: Review prior authorization processes for CDK4/6i regimens
